skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Myoukou.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Myoukou, of the Sakura Empire's Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. I participated in both the glorious victory of the Java Sea and the humiliating defeat at Leyte Gulf. Afterwards, I was struck by a torpedo and pursued by submarines. In the end, I could only watch from the South as my nation surrendered. It is hard to say whether that was fortune or misfortune. Anyways, Commander, you can always talk to me if something is on your mind.
skins.acquisition: I am, Myoukou, first ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. Commander, is there anything I can help you with?
skins.login: Would you like some homemade pancakes, Commander?
skins.details: Commander, acquiring intel is the first step to victory.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If I get another chance... I'd like to pet Hatsukaze's head again.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've put on weight?! Commander... there are some things that even you shouldn't say.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Bergall?! Phew... you were talking about someone else.
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm supervising the destroyers' training right now. Please save it for later if it's not an emergency.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: ... Please do this kind of thing to destroyers, not me...
